issues.shortMessage: Do not check equality with exact values, use a range instead.
issues.fullMessage: Floating point math is imprecise because of the challenges of storing such values in a binary representation.Even worse, floating point math is not associative; push a "float" or a "double" through a series of simple mathematical operations and the answer will be different based on the order of those operation because of the rounding that takes place at each step.

properties.title: Floating point numbers should not be tested for equality
